name: 'her' ENA (Limited Edition)
description:
Little Noggi 'her' is the girls hat option in our reversible ENA range.

The fabric palette is dramatic in its print appearance and versatile in its colour way. 

OPTION 1

Side 1: Coral pink, navy, cream, mint, teal, blue and red.

Side 2: Mint green, charcoal, teal, grey and cream.


OPTION 2

Side 1: Coral pink, navy, cream, mint, teal, blue and red.

Side 2: Mint green, navy, grey and cream.


Quality fabrics have been meticulously selected with aesthetic and environment in mind. The ENA range is centred around organic hand printed, hemp and cotton fabrics designed by SARAH WATERHOUSE, UK textile artist.

This inspired, one-of-a-kind hat is designed for girls from birth to 3 years, for all year round.

This clever little hat is comfortable, reversible, breathable, has widening elastic for growth and it actually STAYS ON!

name: 'hisandher' ENA (Limited Edition)
description:
Little Noggi 'hisandher' is the gender neutral hat option in our reversible ENA range.

The fabric palette is dramatic in its print appearance yet subtle in its colour way. 

Side 1: Dusk blue, taupe, cream and charcoal.

Side 2: Slate grey, red, cream and charcoal.

Quality fabrics have been meticulously selected with aesthetic and environment in mind. The ENA range is centred around organic hand printed, hemp and cotton fabrics designed by SARAH WATERHOUSE, UK textile artist.

This inspired, one-of-a-kind hat is designed for children from birth to 3 years, for all year round.

This clever little hat is comfortable, reversible, breathable, has widening elastic for growth and it actually STAYS ON! 

35cm-41cm (Average 0-3 months)
40cm-45cm (Average 3-6 months)
44cm-47cm (Average 6-12 months)
46cm-49cm (Average 12-18 months)
48cm-51cm (Average 18-24 months)
51cm-54cm (Average 2-3 years)

name: 'his' ENA (Limited Edition)

Quality fabrics have been meticulously selected with aesthetic and environment in mind. The ENA range is centred around organic hand printed, hemp and cotton fabrics designed by SARAH WATERHOUSE, UK textile artist.

This clever little hat is comfortable, reversible, breathable, has widening elastic for growth and it actually STAYS ON!
